remarks: Sum of a constant series (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jul-2017.)
statement:
gsumconstf.k $e |- F/_ k X $.
gsumconstf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumconstf.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
gsumconstf $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ A e. Fin /\ X e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( # ` A ) .x. X ) ) $.
$d A k $.
